Sentencas: As the third generation of fuel cells, solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) provides a clean and low-pollution technology.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrolyte material, which often plays a vital role in SOFC, has always been the focus and difficulty of research.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Y-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte, BaCe1-xYxO3-delta (x = 0, 0.05, 0.1, 0.15), were prepared using the nitrate-citrate-glycine combustion method.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A series of tests and characterizations were performed to examine the structural, morphological, and electrical properties.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction (XRD) analysis proved that the BCY powders with pure cubic perovskite structure were formed after calcined at 1100 degrees C. SEM results showed that the BCY ceramics sintered at 1350 degrees C were dense and well-developed grains.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical performance of BCY proton conductor electrolyte was determined using the electrochemical impedance spectroscopy in dry air and wet air atmosphere at 400-800 degrees C. Results showed that Y-doped BaCeO3-based material had superior conductivity in air and the conductivity of proton conductor was significantly improved under wet air environment.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Furthermore, the electrical conductivity of BCY samples was related to the amount of Y3+ doping.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conductivity in a water vapor environment achieved a maximal value of 0.039 S cm-1 at 800 degrees C when x = 0.15.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: So BaCe1-xYxO3-based materials can be used as a proton conductor electrolyte for SOFC in the medium temperature range.
Titulo: Nanoarchitectonics of yttrium-doped barium cerate-based proton conductor electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells
